title: The Blushing Bounder
description: In The Iron Duke, Constable Newberry helped save all of England. But before the events of that novel, Constable Newberryâ€™s faced a danger of another kind: to his heart, by the woman forced to marry him. What will it take for this prudish bounder to convince his wife to stay?The Blushing Bounder was previously published in the anthology Wild & Steamy. The Blushing Bounder is a short story/novella of approximately 13,400 words (50 pages.)
author: Meljean Brook
